channel.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
channel.description:
Ok, this is my first webpage layout. The reason I have created it is because I'm getting tired of the layout I was given. As of the moment, only the home page has the new layout. I will be adding the layout to the other pages later, since I don't have time right now.
Please rate my home page and give me feedback so I know if there is something I need to remove, change, or work on.
Links (either one will work. Its just that the helzhost.tk one will have an adverisement on top of the page, and will cloak the URL) : [b][url=http://hel.0lx.net]hel.0lx.net[/url][/b] [b][url=http://helzhost.tk]helzhost.tk[/url][/b]
Thank you in advance for any help anyone gives me.

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

[quote=“Spikey Hair, post:22, topic:171584”]Lolz, nice but I see you also use the WebPage Maker V2 I love that thing[/quote]Actually no. I used the sucky blue voda to make it. I quit since then though. I’m making by hand now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Never use a marquee, and light gray text on a slightly darker gray… no.

+When you use an image (like the computer), extract it out of that ugly white background, you can use Photoshop for that.

There’s other things I could mention but I’m sure they’ve been brought up (ie, random mouseovers)

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Sick of Air:

I have a 20" on a 1280x1024 resolution and it’s too wide for my screen…

…Because its 1280x1024… I’m on 1680x900…

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:19, topic:171584”][quote author=Sick of Air link=topic=231633.msg1997166#msg1997166 date=1200373132]
I have a 20" on a 1280x1024 resolution and it’s too wide for my screen…
[/quote]

What a stupid discussion.[/quote]

Why yes, yes it is…

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

I’m pretty certain that the term ‘WWWT’ belongs to someone else already.
The images are terrible, the font is beyond terrible, the layout is terrible, and to top it all off, you’ve written this on your homepage “Welcome to one of the greatest hosts EVER!”. Fail.
-JV

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

http://www.copyright.gov/help/faq/faq-general.html#register

[b]Do I have to register with your office to be protected?[/b] No. In general, registration is voluntary. Copyright exists from the moment the work is created. You will have to register, however, if you wish to bring a lawsuit for infringement of a U.S. work. See Circular 1, Copyright Basics, section “Copyright Registration.”

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

It’s image-based. Instant fail.

Don’t use serif fonts unless for decoration. Especially not Times. Georgia works well in some situations.

Not much flow. Too wide. Mouseovers don’t make sense (using JS for mouseovers is another no-no). The other fonts lack cohesion. The color scheme is bland and erratic.

Read full topic
item.source: [Rate] New WebSite Layout for my site!
